title: Go with MYSTIC over MOLOCH?
body: Moloch was summoned to cure common OS development tragedies and to defeat its own spectre (👹) over eth2. Moloch drew blood and treasure to make eth2 a reality 💰.  From this grant-DAO template, the contracts have been adapted for venture investments in v2 💸. Recent upgrades, in v2x deployed by LexDAO & Raid Guild ⚔️, give Moloch greater magick to allow summoning circles to form and deploy capital and intent into many other contracts on Ethereum 🧙. Shall we maintain OG Moloch mystique, or delve deeper into MYSTIC mysterium in advance of v3, modular designs 🔮?
choices: OTHER, LET'S KICK INTO OTHER VOTE
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
